overview:
Connor is CEO and Co-Founder of DataHug.com A solution that improves sales performance and business networking by automatically managing, measuring and sharing business relationships.

He is an experienced management consultant and technology entrepreneur. He has worked with several Fortune 500 companies, venture start-ups and government organisations.

He holds a first class honors (1H) degree in Computer Science and has lived and worked in London, Boston, NY, DC, Copenhagen, Dubai, Dublin and Kingston Jamaica.
